description: This source file implements the 'bootimg-pcbios' source plugin class for 'wic' used in image creation and partition setup for boot images, specifically for PCB BIOS systems. It contains class definitions, methods for installation, configuration, and preparation of boot partitions, and utilizes external wic libraries and commands.

classes.name: BootimgPcbiosPlugin
classes.description: Creates MBR boot partition and installs syslinux, implementing various methods for boot image setup and partition configuration.

methods.name: _get_bootimg_dir(cls, bootimg_dir, dirname)
methods.description: Checks whether the directory exists in given boot img dir or in STAGING_DATADIR, and handles fallbacks.

methods.name: do_install_disk(cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Installs the master boot record (MBR) onto the disk by copying the appropriate mbr binary.

methods.name: do_configure_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Creates syslinux configuration file and sets up bootloader parameters before partition setup.

methods.name: do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Prepares the boot partition content, copying kernel, bootloader files, creating DOS filesystem image, and configuring syslinux.
